text:
I am using the free version of Slack which is why all my previous conversations get hidden until I upgrade to the premium plan.
Can leaving unwanted channels help?

elements.text:
I am using the free version of Slack which is why all my previous conversations get hidden until I upgrade to the premium plan.
Can leaving unwanted channels help?

text: No, this is a workspace issue, nothing to do with your personal plan

elements.text: No, this is a workspace issue, nothing to do with your personal plan

text: So someone would have to pay for the whole Julia slack to be upgraded, and that cost is calculated on a per user basis ie its $$$

elements.text: So someone would have to pay for the whole Julia slack to be upgraded, and that cost is calculated on a per user basis ie its $$$

text: If you don't like it, there are two options - pay for the upgrade (only viable if you are a tech billionaire) or join the Zulip chat, where we don't have a message limit

elements.text: If you don't like it, there are two options - pay for the upgrade (only viable if you are a tech billionaire) or join the Zulip chat, where we don't have a message limit

text: On slack you have to plan for everything to disappear after one or two weeks

elements.text: On slack you have to plan for everything to disappear after one or two weeks

text: oh, Zulip is in use too? I'd read its chat is similar to Slack but had never used it

elements.text: oh, Zulip is in use too? I'd read its chat is similar to Slack but had never used it

text: Zulip is much less active than Slack imo.

text: For certain topics, I must say.
